subject: docs: complete Dashboard V2 design specification
body:
New hybrid dashboard architecture combining logical groupings with
contextual detail pane. Reduces cognitive load (4 tabs instead of 7)
while enabling in-context drill-down.

Key design decisions:
- Overview/Activity/Work/Health tab structure
- Detail pane slides out on click (preserves context)
- Same data schema for overall and per-repo views
- Urgency and Impact dimensions integrated throughout

Files:
- DASHBOARD_V2_DESIGN.md: Full design spec with layouts and schemas
- SESSION_NOTES.md: Updated current state and next actions
- TODO.md: Reorganized for V2 implementation priorities
- HISTORY.md: Added design session entry
